Name: Rim Worlds Republic
Details: One of the most developed Periphery nations until its destruction, the Rim Worlds Republic bordered the Lyran Commonwealth and was ruled by House Amaris. Under the leadership of Stephan Amaris, the Republic's military forces captured Terra and the rest of Hegemony during the coup that deposed Richard Cameron and installed the Amaris Empire. Its downfall came during the course of the civil war that followed, when it was invaded and conquered by the SLDF under the orders of General Kerensky, as a prelude to the liberation of the Terran Hegemony.
